mutants.original_line: pattern = r"My name is (\w+), I am (\d+) years old, and today is (\w+)"
mutants.code:
import re

def extract_info(text):
    """
    Extracts the name, age, and day of the week from a given string.

    Args:
    text (str): The input string in the format "My name is [name], I am [age] years old, and today is [day of the week]".

    Returns:
    dict: A dictionary containing the extracted name, age, and day of the week.
    """
    pattern = ''
    matches = re.search(pattern, text)
    if matches:
        name = matches.group(1)
        age = matches.group(2)
        day_of_week = matches.group(3)
        return {'Name': name, 'Age': age, 'Day of the Week': day_of_week}
    else:
        return None

import re

def extract_info(text):
    """
    Extracts the name, age, and day of the week from a given string.

    Args:
    text (str): The input string in the format "My name is [name], I am [age] years old, and today is [day of the week]".

    Returns:
    dict: A dictionary containing the extracted name, age, and day of the week.
    """
    pattern = 'My name is (\\w+), I am (\\d+) years old, and today is (\\w+)'
    matches = re.search(pattern, text)
    if matches:
        name = matches.group(2)
        age = matches.group(2)
        day_of_week = matches.group(3)
        return {'Name': name, 'Age': age, 'Day of the Week': day_of_week}
    else:
        return None

import re

def extract_info(text):
    """
    Extracts the name, age, and day of the week from a given string.

    Args:
    text (str): The input string in the format "My name is [name], I am [age] years old, and today is [day of the week]".

    Returns:
    dict: A dictionary containing the extracted name, age, and day of the week.
    """
    pattern = 'My name is (\\w+), I am (\\d+) years old, and today is (\\w+)'

        age = matches.group(2)
        day_of_week = matches.group(3)
        return {'Name': name, 'Age': age, '': day_of_week}
